area: A tutorial area that seems to have no escape.

room: You can see two people in this room, there seems to be an object laying on the ground, and there is a single door leading to another room.
characters: I guess you're trapped here as well :]
Can you try to get me out of here?
items: Not very strong, but it works

room: There is only one person in this room, and a giant key sitting in the corner, there also appears to be a giant door with ancient symbols all over it.
characters: It's no use, the door won't open.
items: Too large to fit into any lock you've ever seen.
events: Blocking the path to anything else is a giant door, there are ancient markings written all over it. Noteable is a large keyhole too big for any key you've ever seen
What do you know, the door opened.

room: No one has ever made it to this room before.
